[ALERT] HOW TO USE THIS TOOL?

Simply input your API key for the chosen AI, press Enter, paste the URL, and let the magic unfold. This versatile tool effortlessly transcribes content in multiple languages including Urdu and Hindi, offering precise timestamps, downloadable PDFs, highlight text, and chapter-wise organization. Experience the future of video analysis with AI-powered summaries displayed conveniently in the video's left corner.
